summary: Start your game as King of Sparta! I used a reference picture to create the detail (this is from vanilla char creation system).
descriptionHtml:
King Leonidas is known for his supreme strength and valor; instantly start your game by playing as King of Sparta, where you are given your first choice whether to follow the Stormcloaks, or follow the Legion.
=========================================================================================
Please endorse this file, and if I get enough then I will now that I should make more characters like this one!
============================================================================================
INSTALL:
simply extract the ESS file (named King_Leonidas) to: User/Documents/ MyGames/Skyrim/Saves

and you should then have the option to load the saved game as King of Sparta!
=========================================================================================
Please enjoy this saved gamed, and play on!

***Feel free to upload this to OTHER sites***
author: MorninJerky
